column1: Smoque BBQ////Smoque catered a work event I recently attended and being originally from Memphis I must say this was some good bbq. We had the full spread from pork
column6: cornbread and some delicious bread pudding! The pork bbq was what you would expect from a true bbq place with nice seasoned smoked crisp edges with a nice consistency to the pulled pork just the right amount of juiciness. A nice surprise because I haven't found many bbq joints here in Chicago that lived up to Memphis. Even had a Memphis sauce which I thought tasted true to form. I would put Smoque right up there with Green Street Smoked Meats as quality bbq joints here in Chicago!
